Name: Planeswalker
Description: You are a veritable god walking among mortal men. You know the kings of Ravnica and quote the fights historical from Phyrexian to Apostasine in order categorical.

Name: Akroma
Description: A very respectable showing indeed. You have a keen and observant eye and can easily distinguish between the many variants of cards. With some deliberate practice you could likely ascend even higher.

Name: Prodigal Sorcerer
Description: Not bad but you could stand to study some more. Some of the more obscure cards you may fail to recognize at all.

Name: Bottle Gnome
Description: Ouch, while you're able to recognize at least a few cards, it's clear that you lack a great deal of  experience and will have to work hard to rise in station. You don't want people thinking you're a mere patzer, do you?

Name: Chimney Imp
Description: You have a difficult time telling the difference between an mountain and a swamp. Frankly, if we didn't know better we'd think you're color-blind, or just regular blind. Are you sure you wouldn't rather just play Pokemon?
